name: Muscle Fit Cotton Shirt
description: Short-sleeved shirt in woven, stretch cotton fabric. Narrow band collar, classic button placket, and yoke and darts at back. Sewn cuffs on sleeves and rounded hem. Muscle Fit – designed to showcase physique. Narrow shoulders, gently tapered sleeves, and accentuated waist for a flattering silhouette.
importedBy: Marketed and  H&M Hennes & Mauritz Retail Pvt. Ltd. A-wing, D-3, 2nd Floor District Centre Saket New Delhi -110017 India
